roleset.name: scare very badly, scared
roleset.note: TERRIFY-V NOTES: Member of Vncls force-59-1, amuse-31.1. (from terrify.01-v)
TERRIFIED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from terrified.01-j)
TERRIFYING-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from terrifying.01-j)

example.name: agentive, sorta
example.text: He thinks government officials are terrified [*] to let a recession start when government, corporate and personal debt levels are so high.
example.arg: [*] to let a recession start when government, corporate and personal debt levels are so high

example.name: prepositional
example.text: John is terrified over the thought of graduating and entering the 'real world'.
example.arg: over the thought of graduating and entering the 'real world'

example.name: all args
example.text: Mary terrified John into giving up smoking.
